channel.title: Change Text
channel.description:
Ok, I need to know how to change the text in three places.
1. Under emotions... where you can click different emotions to teleport places.
2. In the bank, the tabs that ask if you want to withdraw as an item or note.
3. On the friends list, the button to add or to delete a friend. "Add Friend"
-Gaz

item.title: Change Text
item.dc:creator: @gazer11 gazer11
item.description:
@gazer11 wrote:

Ok, I need to know how to change the text in three places.

  1. Under emotions… where you can click different emotions to teleport places.

  2. In the bank, the tabs that ask if you want to withdraw as an item or note.

  3. On the friends list, the button to add or to delete a friend. “Add Friend”
